statements: DELETE FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE director = 'Christopher Nolan' AND title = 'Inception';
DELETE FROM directors WHERE director_name = 'Steven Spielberg';
DELETE FROM movies WHERE movie_title = 'The Shawshank Redemption';
DELETE FROM movie_directors WHERE movie_id = 100 AND director_id = 50;
DELETE FROM directors WHERE director_name = 'Christopher Nolan';
DELETE FROM ratings WHERE rating > 8.5 AND movie_id IN (SELECT movie_id FROM movies WHERE year_released < 2010);
